name: UMediaSoundComponent
doc: Implements a sound component for playing a media player's audio output.

DynamicRateAdjustment: Dynamically adjust the sample rate if audio and media clock desynchronize.
RateAdjustmentFactor:
Factor for calculating the sample rate adjustment.

If dynamic rate adjustment is enabled, this number is multiplied with the drift
between the audio and media clock (in 100ns ticks) to determine the adjustment.
that is to be multiplied into the current playrate.
RateAdjustmentRange:
The allowed range of dynamic rate adjustment.

If dynamic rate adjustment is enabled, and the necessary adjustment
falls outside of this range, audio samples will be dropped.

methods.name: GetAttenuationSettingsToApply
GetMediaPlayer
GetNormalizedSpectralData
methods.doc: Retrieves and normalizes the spectral data if spectral analysis is enabled.

methods.name: GetSpectralData
methods.doc: Retrieves the spectral data if spectral analysis is enabled.

methods.name: SetEnableEnvelopeFollowing
methods.doc: Turns on amplitude envelope following the audio in the media sound component.

methods.name: SetEnableSpectralAnalysis
methods.doc: Turns on spectral analysis of the audio generated in the media sound component.

methods.name: SetEnvelopeFollowingsettings
methods.doc: Sets the envelope attack and release times (in ms).

methods.name: SetMediaPlayer
SetSpectralAnalysisSettings
methods.doc: Sets the settings to use for spectral analysis.
